summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3914 for the improvement of 31st Avenue Northeast form East 55th Street to East 60th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47636, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
